landingPage.description: Streamline your software development projects with our powerful management tool-track progress, collaborate effectively, and boost productivity effortlessly.
landingPage.howItWorkDes: Explore powerful features designed to enhance project management-track tasks, collaborate in real time, and optimize workflow efficiently.
landingPage.whyChooseUsDesc: Maximize productivity, enhance collaboration, and keep your projects on track with our all-in-one management solution.
landingPage.whoWeAreDesc: This is our graduation project, the final milestone of our journey at HCMUTE. It marks the end of one chapter but also the beginning of a new adventure in our lives.

landingPage.thanks1: A heartfelt thank you to Dr. Mai Anh Th∆°, who has guided our team to successfully complete this project.
landingPage.thanks2: Deep gratitude to all the esteemed lecturers who have taught and mentored us throughout our journey.
landingPage.thanks3: Thank you to our families for being our unwavering support system, allowing us to learn and grow.
landingPage.thanks4: To our friends, thank you for walking this journey with us and creating unforgettable memories over the years.
landingPage.thanks5: Special thanks to our two amazing girls for always standing by our side throughout this long journey-and beyond.
landingPage.thanks6: And finally, thank ourselves for giving it our all.
